8.1 Pregnancy 
Teratogenic Effects 
Pregnancy Category C 
[Drugname] caused some developmental toxicity in rats, but was not 
teratogenic in rats or rabbits. There are no adequate and well-controlled 
studies of [TRADENAME] in pregnant women.
